content: this the cloud catcher pattern a free pattern which is available on my blog and especially made for the new scheepjes skies yarn the pattern is a multifunctional one as it can be used to make a doily out of it or connect two sides and create a nice round cushion all information about sizes yarntypes and all other general information can be found in the pattern which you can download for free on my blog the pattern is available in english us french translated by celine kavanagh dutch and swedish translated by anette hakansson the blogpost about the pattern is also written in both languages as it is a free pattern you can use this for personal use if you like to share this pattern or use for any business/commercial use please contact me before you do standard copyright rules are applied on this pattern
